scripts.start: docker run -d --memory {{ cookiecutter.docker_ram }} -p {{ cookiecutter.host_port }}:{{ cookiecutter.container_port }} --name {{ cookiecutter.project_slug }} {{ cookiecutter.docker_user }}/{{ cookiecutter.project_slug }}
scripts.logs: docker ps -a --filter 'ancestor={{ cookiecutter.docker_user }}/{{ cookiecutter.project_slug }}' --format {% raw %} '{{.ID}}' {% endraw %} | xargs -I {} docker logs {}
scripts.stop: docker stop {{ cookiecutter.project_slug }} && docker rm {{ cookiecutter.project_slug }}
scripts.bash: docker run -p {{ cookiecutter.host_port }}:{{ cookiecutter.container_port }} --entrypoint /bin/bash -it {{ cookiecutter.docker_user }}/{{ cookiecutter.project_slug }}
scripts.k-kill: kubectl get pods | grep '^{{ cookiecutter.project_slug }}' | awk '{print $1}' | xargs kubectl delete pod --grace-period=0 --force
